useCase.name: Update Job Opening
useCase.description: User requests to update a job opening, selects a job opening, and chooses to update the interview model by providing a file path.

preconditions.precondition: The User has logged in and has necessary permissions to update job openings.

successEndConditions.condition: The job opening is successfully updated with the provided file.

failureEndConditions.condition: The User does not have permission to update job openings.

mainSequence.step: User requests to update a job opening and the System shows a list of job references.
User selects a job opening and the System requests what the User wants to update.
User chooses to update the interview model and the System requests the file.
User inputs the file path and the System displays the updated job opening along with an operation success message.
